summary: This is an email from August 3, 2020, discussing whether to provide information to a UK reporter about potential additional victims calling into a help line related to the Epstein case. The sender references a previous instance where information was provided about the Epstein help line and seeks guidance on whether to do the same again.

events.title: UK Reporter Inquiry About Epstein Help Line
events.description: A UK reporter asks whether there have been potentially additional victims calling into a help line related to the Epstein case.

keyFacts: A UK reporter inquired about potential additional victims calling into a help line related to the Epstein case.
The email references a previous instance where information was provided about the Epstein help line when asked a similar question.
The sender is seeking guidance on whether to provide information to the reporter this time.
The correspondence is dated August 3, 2020, indicating ongoing media or public interest in the case years after Epstein's death.
